author: Tony G
title: A gorgeous, intimate property in the heart of ancient Rome
text:
The Inn is a tremendous place, one of the best I've ever found anywhere. Great service, perfect location. The breakfast is ample and delicious, with kind, interesting people, led by Barb, to both serve and educate on Rome's many sites. The evening snacks are great, and one of the guys turned out to be an expert at making a perfect gin and tonic! But the best thing about this hotel is its location. Ruins of Ancient Rome are embedded in the hotel's walls, and you can visit an ancient set of rooms excavated behind the reception area. The Roman Forum, Colosseum, etc. are minutes away on foot.
Room Tip: I was at the hotel for more than a week, so they immediately upgraded me to a super 4 room apartment... See more room tips
